Name: LONER
About the game: This is a story about one student Aline who sincerely believes and dreams to prove everyone - aliens exist. But all that she gets is insults of her mates that donâ€™t take her seriously. Loner - is a classic 2D quest game with opened world where the main aim is doing mini quests and small puzzles. Go ahead to unforgettable adventures!
